page.title: 07GAMES WE PLAY IN CLUNBURY
page.content: { Tig}is a game that we play on the school's play_ground. In{Tig,}when you are{on it}you chase someone and tig them.{On it}means that you have been touched by someone else who was{on it; you then have to chase someone and touch them and so on. { Rounders}is another of the games we play for recreation. In it you have four{bays}and two teams. One team goes {in.}They have bats to hit the ball with. A{bowler}bowls; he is on the {fielding}side. The{fielding}side has to stop the batting side from getting all the way round round the four bays in one go and scoring a{rounder.}The ways to get them out are to{stump}one of the{bays}(Touch it) with the ball or to{catch}them out before the ball bounces when they hit the ball.
